column1: "The recommendation of the Human Rights Commission contained in PI la and
P12 does not take effect proprio vigore. There is no provision in the said Act to
enforce  the  recommendation  of  the  said  Commission.  If  the  Commission  's
recommendations are not complied with, the Commission can only report to
the  President  and  in turn  it  can be placed  in  Parliament.  In  view  of this  the
recommendation of the Human Rights Commission cannot be quashed by a
